mobs.LongDesc: The Emperor sits here glaring at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is Emperor Palpatine. He appears to be old and weak, but this
act is only used to fool the ones that are truly weak.  You can sense a
dark power emanating from him and you realize maybe he's not the frail
old man he seems to be.  His dark and heavy robes hide most of his face
except for that evil grin of his.  He sits stooped over waiting for you t
make your move.

mobs.LongDesc: A security laser cannon is here turning towards you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This huge laser cannon and others like it are used to keep unwanted vistitors
out of restricted areas.  The Empire uses them to reduce the amount of 
manpower used.  It is large and quite powerful.  It is state-of-the-art and
is a very useful weapon.  This one has seen some action, and is about to see
some more as it attacks you!

mobs.LongDesc: The Lord of the Sith is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Darth Vader, Lord of the Sith, is encased in an all black armored suit.
He is one of the tallest men you have ever seen.  The dark power he
emenates causes even the bravest to cringe and look away.  He breathes
through a respirator adding to the already fearsome visage.  He looks at
you with penetrating eyes and you know he can see more then whats on the
surface.  As you start pondering whether or not you ought to fight him,
he attacks.

mobs.LongDesc: An abnormally hairy Princress Leia is here
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is the ugliest looking princess you've ever laid eyes on.  Then you
realize that this is only Princess Leia's stunt double.  She is abnormaly
hairy and appears to be wearing fake hair buns.  She is also smoking a
big fat Cuban cigar.

mobs.LongDesc: A mechanic is standing here trying to look busy.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This mechanic and others like him are the backbone of the Imperial Navy.
He is covered with grease and other lubricants from head to toe.  He is
a bit tired looking.  No doubt from the long hard hours of repairing
damage caused by the Rebels.

mobs.LongDesc: A bored Tie pilot is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
It's hard being a Tie pilot.  The hours of endless formation and patrol flying
wear on one's morale.  The pay and insurance doesn't compensate the knowledge
that a fatal laser blast could happen at any time.  Stress and battle fatigue
has aged this man past his years.

mobs.LongDesc: Grand Moff Tarkin stands here trying to find the Rebel base.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Grand Moff Tarkin has a very stern face.  When he stares at you his stare
can make even the bravest man cringe.  He is dressed in his grey Moff
uniform.  His hair is beyond greying and is starting to fall out.
He is not the biggest man you've ever seen.  Of course he didn't earn
his rank by being a brute.  He is a cruel man that got to where he was
by scheming his way to the top.

mobs.LongDesc: An assassin droid is here looking for another kill.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This droid is one of the deadliest foes you have ever crossed.  It is a 
slick black droid thats only purpose is to kill.  It does this with deadly
accuracy.  Even though illegal in both the Rebellion and the Empire, this
one is the Emperor's personnal assassin.  With it's weapons drawn it looks
for more prey.  It seems as if it delights in killing.  It looks around and
decides you should be next.  FLEE it's attacking you!

mobs.LongDesc: An Imperial Stormtrooper is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Imperial Stormtrooper's are the elite soldiers of the emperor's army.
They are trained for any situation.  They can be on the Star Destroyers or
in land based operations.  They are always wearing there white metallic suit
and carrying there hand blasters.  Always ready to defend the Empire from
the increasing Rebel threat.

mobs.LongDesc: An Imperial Stormtrooper is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Imperial Stormtrooper is an elite soldier.  He does the dirty work the
basic Imperial soldiers can't do.  He kills in the name of the Emperor.  This
is all the reason he needs.  If you get in his way or in the way of the Empire
then you will be this Stormtroopers next target.

mobs.LongDesc: A naval trooper is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is the grunt of the Imperial Navy.  He does what he does very good.
He is wearing a black uniform with an abnormally large helmet.  He is the
most common soldier in the navy and he is considered expendable by his
superiors.

mobs.LongDesc: A monster that feeds on trash is here munchin on garbage.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is one of the wierdest creatures you have ever seen.  It looks like a 
large octopus with one large eye on a stalk.

mobs.LongDesc: An Imperial Naval Officer is standing here givin orders.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This officer is very nervous.  To rise in rank in Vader's navy is to have
a superior die.  One screw up and your inferiors rise in rank.  He is dressed
in an all black uniform.  He has wrinkles and grey hair.

mobs.LongDesc: A guard in red uniform is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is the Emperor's personal bodyguard.  He can use the force to a slight 
degree but mainly relies upon his strength.  Dressed in his all red uniform,
you can't tell much about him.  The red helmet he wears has a small black
view area in the front.  These guards are very dangerous with there force-
pikes.  Beware they always travel in twos.

mobs.LongDesc: The captain of the Corvette Mescue is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is the captain of the Corvette Mescue.  He is a tall man in his early
forties.  His hair is just starting to grey.  He hardly ever smiles.  It
looks like his face was made for a permenant frown.  He looks at you as if
you are below his need for attention.  He needs a lesson tought to him
and you are the person(or people) to do it.

mobs.LongDesc: Han Solo's clone is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
While the real Han Solo is away his clone fills in to keep up appearances.
This clone is the one you pay to take you to the Death Star.  He is very 
strong and attacking him would not be recommended.  He is not as nice as the 
real Han and won't take crap from anybody.  So him your money and get on
board.

mobs.LongDesc: A small mouse droid gets in your way and beeps at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Of all the annoying mobs you had to run into you had to get this one.  All
it is is a small black box on wheels.  How it can attack is beyond anybody
Kill it, step on it growl at it, who cares, but for the Gods' sake stop
staring at it.  All it craves is that attention.

mobs.LongDesc: A very long very powerful laser beam is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Hiding until called upon to destroy, the super laser looks for something to
blow up in the future.  You are the closest thing it's seen in a while.  This
very thin, very long, and very powerful laser only waits for the command to
destroy you.  It is a big green light basicly, but it does have the power to 
kill.  Be wary it will attack if provoked.  Good luck if you decide to
provoke.

mobs.LongDesc: A very tall and regal dignitary stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
She is the leader of a clan of healers.  She doesn't really trust the other
dignitaries, but she has learned to accept and offer her help.  She is very
tall, and has long flowing red hair.  She wears a combat medic bodice and
loose fitting dark colored breeches.  If you attack her the others will 
surely help.  Be careful.

mobs.LongDesc: A short dignitary is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He is short, but so what.  With his magic he can fry you pretty quick.  He
helps the others grudgingly becasue they help him.  Fortunately for you
he is weak by himself.  He is very short and has a bald head.  He wears
his yellow mage robes with pride.  Attack him if you must, just watch your
back because the other dignitaries are watching his.

mobs.LongDesc: A stocky dignitary is here waitng for a meal.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
She is very well built.  Her stockiness is hidden behind her ceremonial army.
She likes the help of others and likes to help them.  She knows that she is
the strongest of the three of them.  She full well knows that she can you
take you on by herself.  Enjoy taking her on because she'll love killing you.

mobs.LongDesc: Gypsy drools over her Richard Bashart picture.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Gypsy is a strange looking robot.  Her head is purple and she has a
flashlight as an eye.  Her body is long and snake-like.  She was built to
run the higher functions of the satellite, so she can't join Mike and the
other bots in the theatre.

mobs.LongDesc: Tom Servo hovers about singing.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Tom is a squat, fire hydrant of a guy.  Actually, he looks more like a little
red bubble-gum machine.  He floats in the air, thanks to his hoverskirt.  He
is happy and optimistic, but has been known to get into trouble with Crow.
His arms look like Slinkys and are totally useless.  Thank goodness he has a
good singing voice because he really likes to use it.

mobs.LongDesc: Mike Nelson is having his Mind monitored.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Mike was a Temp hired by Dr. Forrester to help with an inventory.  When Joel
escaped, Dr. F and TV's Frank needed a new test case, so they conked him on
the noggen and shot him into space.  Mike has to watch cheesy movies so Dr. F.
can monitor his mind.  Mike is an average looking guy, with
a buzz cut and a goofy looking grin.  Crow and Tom keep Mike from
going insane.

mobs.LongDesc: Crow T. Robot sits here crackin at the movie.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Crow T. Robot is the prankster of the group, always getting into some kind of
trouble.  He reminds you of your little brother.  Crow is golden in color.
He looks like he was put together from a yard sale.  His "hair" is a lacross
face mask, his mouth a bowling pin, his eyes are yellow ping-pong balls, and
his shoulders look like two lids from Tupperware dishes.

mobs.LongDesc: TV's Frank is pigging out on chinese food.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
TV's Frank is Dr. Forrester's assistant.  He is a short, stocky fella with
bleach-blond hair that curls in front.  Frank has the personality of a game
show host but the confidence of a lab rat.  Speaking of which, Dr. F. has
performed scores of scientific experiments on Frank such as, draining all his
blood, hooking up a generator to his heart, and removing his liver.  Torgo is
probably the only sidekick to have a worse boss.

mobs.LongDesc: Dr. Forrester yells, 'I WILL KILL YOU!'
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Dr. Clayton Forrester is the epitome of mad scientists.  He even looks the
part, hair unkept, red glasses borrowed from his talk show counterpart (Sally
Jesse Raphael), lab coat, and that weird look in his eyes.  The Gizmonic Inst.
put him down here to keep the world safe.  He truly enjoys causing Mike, Frank
and the bots to suffer.
